title: Hytale Server Scoring: How We Rank the Best Vanilla Worlds
excerpt: Curious about how we decide which servers make it to the top of our list? We break down our 100-point scoring system and the strict exclusion rules we apply to every listing.
content:
Ranking Hytale servers is both an art and a science. As we prepare for the beta, our editorial team has developed a robust framework to ensure that only the most stable, fair, and high-quality vanilla communities are featured.

The 100-Point System

Our scoring is divided into four main categories, each contributing to the final editor score you see on our cards.

  • Performance (30 pts): Based on tick rate stability and latency tests.
  • Community Health (30 pts): Based on moderation activity and player retention.
  • Vanilla Integrity (20 pts): How far the server deviates from the core Hytale experience.
  • Monetization (20 pts): Strict penalties for pay-to-win mechanics.

By applying these standards, we hope to foster a community of high-quality servers that players can trust.
